sentences.en: Atmospheric and radiometric correction is the basis and key for quantificational remote sensing.
sentences.cn: 卫星遥感数据的大气辐射校正是定量遥感的基础与关键.

sentences.en: Consequently, radiometric dating has advanced briskly in the past 30 years.
sentences.cn: 因此, 新近三十年来,放射性计时迅猛发展.

sentences.en: High resolution spaceborne SAR gives new challenge to radiometric calibration.
sentences.cn: 高分辨率星载SAR技术的发展,对辐射定标提出了新的挑战.

sentences.en: It consists of three procedures : radiometric calibration of SAR image, wind direction determination and speed calculation.
sentences.cn: 该方法包括SAR图像辐射定标 、 海面风向确定和风速计算.

sentences.en: Radiometric techniques are not always appropriate to the earth for uranium deposits.
sentences.cn: 放射性方法在铀矿普查中并不总是有效的.

sentences.en: Radon measurement technique is a radiometric geophysical method in search for deep concealed deposits.
sentences.cn: 测氡方法是寻找深部隐伏矿的一种放射性地球物理方法.

sentences.en: Secondly, the relation between high resolution spaceborne SAR radiometric calibration and SMP is discussed.
sentences.cn: 其次, 讨论了高分辨率星载SAR辐射定标与卫星运动参数的关联技术.

sentences.en: Subsequent discoverjes were made by geological mapping and low - level airborne radiometric surveys.
sentences.cn: 地质填图和低空放射性航测又继续探明了一批矿点.

sentences.en: These radiometric Hall - effect sensors provide a voltage output that is proportional to the applied magnetic field.
sentences.cn: 这些比例式霍尔效应传感器提供与所适用磁场成比例的电压输出.

sentences.en: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit.
sentences.cn: 我们还通过辐射测量的方法矫正了轨道，使之更加精确。

sentences.en: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit. This should make it easier to contact Phobos-Grunt in future.
sentences.cn: 我们还通过辐射测量的方法矫正了轨道，使之更加精确。这有利于我们未来更加容易地与探测器取得联系。

phrases.tran_cn: 放射性定年法；同位素年龄测定

trans.tran_cn: 辐射度的，放射性测量的
